subject: U.S Department of the Treasu
body:
U.S Department of the Treasury
Address: 1500
Pennsylvania Avenue,
NW, in Washington,
D.C USA
Attention: Unpaid Beneficiary
Based on the meeting held with the President of the United States, Joe
Biden, United Nations, and the IMF officials on your payment, I'm
writing to inform you that your payment file appeared to pay you a
partial payment of $10.5 Million of your Inheritance fund in this
middle of Year.
But unfortunately we have a misunderstanding with one Mrs. ROSE MARTINS who
claimed that she is the next of kin to the fund that you instructed
her to receive on your behalf because you are totally sick and cannot
work or answer calls.
We are very confused about this because the authority instructed me to
contact you for us to know if what she is telling is true or not as
She forwarded this bank details to us for the remittance of the fund.
1, ACCOUNT HOLDER: ROSE MARTINS
2. BANK NAME: BANK OF AMERICA
3. BANK ADDRESS: Kerrville Texas 78028 USA
4. ACCOUNT #: 3202650
5. ROUTING #: 114922443
After she provided the account, she instructed us not to inform you
that we should transfer the fund to the account directly because she
is the next of kin to pay US$370 for the dispensation bill.
Kindly check the above account and name if we should release the fund to her.
Contact me as quickly as you confirm the receipt of this mail.
Don't keep us waiting for your own good.
Justice delayed is justice denied.
Greetings,
Janet Yellen
United States Secretary of the Treasury
CC: (FBI)
CC: (CIA)
CC: (UNITED NATIONS)
CC: (FEDERAL RESERVE BANK)

subject: Re:   U.S Department of the Treasu
body:
Hello Janet Yellen,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I wasn't aware that there was any fund in my name. 

As for Mrs. Rose Martins, I'm afraid there might be some misunderstanding. While I do know a Rose, she's not related to me nor is she my next of kin. Also, I'm not sick and am perfectly capable of answering calls and working.

Could you please provide more details about this fund? How did it come into existence? And why was it assigned to me?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Edward
